enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Whether to display an anchor indicator on top of the card pile the <c=card>Anchor</c> is currently in.

tooltip.title: Card Marking
tooltip.description: Choose a color and a symbol, then click on a card to mark it. The mark will also appear on the pile the card is in.

clearTooltip.title: Clear Marks
clearTooltip.description: When selected, clicking on a card will clear all of its marks.
